alert.note: Alert for Nowata; Osage; Rogers; Washington (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 2:14AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Craig, northern Rogers, northeastern Osage, northwestern Mayes, Washington and Nowata Counties through 300 AM CDT... At 214 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Grainola to near Bartlesville to 4 miles southwest of Foyil. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Bartlesville... Claremore... Nowata... Pawhuska... Dewey... Chelsea... Barnsdall... Oologah... South Coffeyville... Copan... Ramona... Ochelata... Delaware... Foyil... Avant... Lenapah... Talala... Vera... Wann... New Alluwe... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
